description: Fetches and returns example articles from predefined sources. Demonstrates ClearCoreAI agent architecture.
author: ClearCoreAI Contributors

usage_guidelines.intended_use: Example agent to demonstrate the ClearCoreAI architecture.
usage_guidelines.limitations: Does not perform real-time web scraping or dynamic LLM-based summarization in this example.
usage_guidelines.safety_notes: This is an educational example agent. Not intended for production use.
